titleStmt.title: Description of University of Manchester Library, Gaster Hebrew MS 118: Remedies and prescriptions

notesStmt.note: Some text in Latin characters on folios 14a, 14b, 17b, 18b-21a, 24a, 26b, 27b, 29b, 31b, 35a-36a, 37a-38Aa, 45a, 50a-b, 51b, 52b, mostly in German. Sporadic Tiberian vocalisation; occasional use of rafe. Mostly Yiddish and German remedies with the occasional Hebrew word or phrase, most obviously קח ("take!") at the beginning of some prescriptions. Paper has laid lines parallel to spine, and single chain lines 22.5 mm apart horizontally.

msContents.summary: Medical and magico-medical remedies and prescriptions up to folio 55a. Between folios 1a and 53a there are approximately 440 texts, numbered in Hebrew 68-508 (סח-תקח) by another hand. Quite a few remedies written either solely or mostly in German with Latin characters, possibly some Latin phrases such as for materia medica. Folio 51a contains rules for the handling of the Sefer Torah. Folios 55b-56a contain a documentary text in Yiddish, which appears to be a list.

msItem.title: Gaster Hebrew MS 118/1, [ff. 1a - 55a] Medical and magico-medical remedies and prescriptions
Gaster Hebrew MS 118/2, [51b]Eight rules regarding the handling of the Sefer Torah in the synagogue

support.watermark: Person blowing post horn riding on horse, on folios 25-27. Two columns on folio 33; Two trees growing together at top to form an inverted U shape on folios 33-34, 38A, 41, 45-47, 49-50, 54.

supportDesc.extent: i+58+i; 189 x 161 mm bound to 228 x 170 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern pencil foliation in Arabic numerals at the top outer corner of side a of each folio (1a-56a). Folio 26 lacks foliation. Folio 40 is numbered 38A. Hebrew foliation at the top outer corner of side a of each folio: 70-89 (פ-צט) on folios 1-18; missing 72 (פב). On folios 19-29 alphabetical foliation: b-f (19a-23a), missing on folio 24a, g-I (25a-26a), missing on folio 27a, l-ll (28a-29a). Somewhat inconsistent Hebrew numbering of paragraphs. Missing: two folios between 1 and 2 (cf. the Hebrew foliation and paragraphs). Blank pages: 38Ab, 41b-42a, 52a.

layoutDesc.layout: Layout throughout the codex is irregular and leading close to the edges. Numbering of paragraphs is given in Hebrew.

binding.p: Modern black leather binding. Handwritten label on spine reading in Hebrew טייטש / עיברי / רפואות / 118

history.provenance: Acquired by The John Rylands Library from the heirs of Moses Gaster, 1954.
